title: Best Quotes Of Week: The Barclays
headline: Best Quotes Of Week: The Barclays
description: Rickie Fowler on darkness at Valhalla, Tiger Woods' warning to Rory McIlroy, how Slip'N Slide injured Matt Kuchar, Caroline Wozniacki on being single, and why Tour players shouldn't get on Jim Furyk's bad side.
